title: Looking for people to climb on SIlver!

replies.body:
Join my discord community :3 players from bronze-plat and everyones organized by role mained with an elo tag. Just message the owner when you get in with your main role/rank to be tagged, and say hello to everyone!
https://discord.gg/011amLs7jFplGPy7D if you dont have the app installed, just paste this in your browswer. Thanks! {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
